name: a forgotten blossom
description: You just arrived at Springville High! With so many (4) (four) girls to choose from, and so many (4) (four) possible endings, this game so much fun! this is a long-ish game wiht way too many paths you should play all of them please please please please please please please oh please PLEASE PLSEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASES AHHH [LEASE [;EASE PLEAAESEEEE PLAPLELASPEPL PLEASE PLEASE PLASE music and sprites made by me :3 PLEASE PLAEASE PLAA
